page.title: PhoneGap Cli로 apk빌드하기
page.content: PhoneGap Build    Build CLI인데 cordova platform add 를 먼저 한다.    TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap build android --release    [phonegap] executing 'cordova platform add --save android ' ...    [phonegap] completed 'cordova platform add --save android --no-telemetry'    [phonegap] executing 'cordova build android --release ' ...    [phonegap] completed 'cordova build android --release --no-telemetry'        TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap build ios --release    [phonegap] executing 'cordova platform add --save ios ' ...    [phonegap] completed 'cordova platform add --save ios --no-telemetry'    [phonegap] executing 'cordova build ios --release ' ...    [phonegap] completed 'cordova build ios --release --no-telemetry'            파일구조의 변화    Package.json    cordova.platforms에 android, ios가 추가되어있음    dependencies에 android, ios가 추가되어있음    ./platforms, ./node_modules 폴더    Android, ios폴더 추가되어있음    apk파일 위치    platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-[debug||release].apk        PhoneGap Build Help    TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:workspace taeseongpark$ phonegap build help        Usage: phonegap build [<platforms>] [options] [-- [platform options]]        Description:          Builds your application for one or more specified platforms. When no      platforms are specified, all installed platforms will be built.          The build task will first prepare and then compile your application.      If you want more control, you can individually prepare and compile      your application with the commands.        Options:          --debug                   build in debug mode (default)      --release                 build in release mode        Experimental Options:          --browserify              plugin javascript is loaded into cordova.js        Examples:          $ phonegap build android      $ phonegap build android ios      $ phonegap build ios --release        Also See:          phonegap help prepare      phonegap help compile
page.html:
PhoneGap Build

Build CLI인데 cordova platform add 를 먼저 한다.

TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap build android --release

[phonegap] executing 'cordova platform add --save android ' ...

[phonegap] completed 'cordova platform add --save android --no-telemetry'

[phonegap] executing 'cordova build android --release ' ...

[phonegap] completed 'cordova build android --release --no-telemetry'


TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:webspeech_test taeseongpark$ phonegap build ios --release

[phonegap] executing 'cordova platform add --save ios ' ...

[phonegap] completed 'cordova platform add --save ios --no-telemetry'

[phonegap] executing 'cordova build ios --release ' ...

[phonegap] completed 'cordova build ios --release --no-telemetry'



파일구조의 변화

Package.json

cordova.platforms에 android, ios가 추가되어있음

dependencies에 android, ios가 추가되어있음

./platforms, ./node_modules 폴더

Android, ios폴더 추가되어있음

apk파일 위치

platforms/android/build/outputs/apk/android-[debug||release].apk


PhoneGap Build Help

TaeSeongui-MacBook-Air:workspace taeseongpark$ phonegap build help


Usage: phonegap build [<platforms>] [options] [-- [platform options]]


Description:


Builds your application for one or more specified platforms. When no

platforms are specified, all installed platforms will be built.


The build task will first prepare and then compile your application.

If you want more control, you can individually prepare and compile

your application with the commands.


Options:


--debug build in debug mode (default)

--release build in release mode


Experimental Options:


--browserify plugin javascript is loaded into cordova.js


Examples:


$ phonegap build android

$ phonegap build android ios

$ phonegap build ios --release


Also See:


phonegap help prepare

phonegap help compile
